mapper.select: select a.uid as uid ,a.fromuid as fromuid ,a.did as did ,a.gid as gid, a.mweight as mweight,a.content as content,a.fid as fid,us.uname as touname, d.department as department ,g.gname as gname,f.fname as fname from (select m.uid as uid ,m.fromuid as fromuid ,m.did as did ,m.gid as gid, m.mweight as mweight,m.content as content,m.fid as fid from message m inner join users u on ( m.did=u.did and ISNULL(m.gid) and ISNULL(m.uid)) or (m.did =u.did and m.gid=u.gid and ISNULL(m.uid)) or (m.did = u.did and m.gid =u.gid and m.uid=u.uid) where u.uid=#{uid}) a left join users us on a.uid=us.uid left join groups g on a.gid= g.gid left join department d on a.did=d.did left join file f on a.fid=f.fid where 1=1

select m.mid as mid ,m.content as content,m.mweight as mweight, m.createtime as createtime,m.fromuid as fromuid,u.uname as touname , d.department as department,g.gname as gname,f.fname as fname,f.fid as fid from message m left join department d on m.did=d.did left join groups g on m.gid=g.gid left join users u on u.uid=m.uid left join file f on m.fid=f.fid where m.fromuid=#{fromuid}
select count(*) from message where fromuid=#{uid}

select count(*) from message m inner join users u on ( m.did=u.did and ISNULL(m.gid) and ISNULL(m.uid)) or (m.did =u.did and m.gid=u.gid and ISNULL(m.uid)) or (m.did = u.did and m.gid =u.gid and m.uid=u.uid) where u.uid=#{uid}
